message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Could you consider that?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on $9000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $8500?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $8800?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $8200?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $8400?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $8000?
